reviews.review:
Pros: 
- Various Killers and Survivors
- Various maps
- Great skins for Killers and Survivors
- Has replayability 

Cons:
- Toxicity within the community is disturbing
- Back and forth with nerfs and buffs.
- Some players go unpunished
- Exclusive items are no longer exclusive
- Pay to look good, or grind away to look good

Most fucked and unbalanced game of the year.

es un buen juego,pero la jugabilidad en cuanto a esos bugs donde te saca de las partidas,o no podes entrar a jugar con amigos le sacan la gracia. pague un juego que no puedo jugar literalmente,porque nunca encuentra partidas cuadno estoy con amigos o hasta cuando estoy solo.

Take this review from someone who has now over 900+ hours and plays survivor more than killer (I still play killer often), and enjoys games not based on graphics but on gameplay. For a review from someone who plays both equally or killer more, read other reviews to take their input into account

PROS
=====
- Not pay to win, you can easily beat a player who spent dozens over this game with skill alone.
- Hilarious to play with friends who are weak-hearted (Trust me on this one).
- Fair ranking system (Just because you die as a survivor or you don't kill anyone as a killer doesn't necessarily mean you will de-rank, as ranking is based upon your performance during a game).
- Wide range of cosmetics and characters alike which does not affect how well you would play.
- Interesting lore for every character and the game as a whole which is constantly being updated with every Archives season.
- Microphones aren't mandatory and you can still effectively communicate among survivors with the point/come here actions alone.
-  The game isn't repetitive in the sense that you constantly have to change your approach depending on the map you're facing, the killer, the killer's perks, the survivors' perks and so on and so forth.
- The game has a HIGHLY active development and there are always new killers, survivors, perks, maps, cosmetics and lore which will ensure you won't easily get bored of the same old gameplay.

CONS
=====
- Matchmaking can be sometimes unfair, especially when there are times a new player who is playing killer is suddenly up against a team of survivors who all are in the red ranks (Ranks 4-1)
- Camping killers ; While camping a hooked survivor is considered a valid tactic, it ultimately ruins the experience for the hooked survivor as they are forced to just wait to be killed or eventually die, and they are forced to suck it up or sound like a sore loser if they complain.
- Generator repairs is the only main objective currently present in the game as I am writing this review. It can get repetitive having to hold down mouse 1 and pressing space at the right time. Hopefully the developers will implement different objectives, such as capturing a small area which will alert the killer if someone steps in said area or maybe even transferring objectives from one side of the map to another and it will be dropped if the survivor is damaged by the killer.
- While all of the cosmetics are amazing, some actually give a disadvantage to the survivors such as when a survivor wears bright colored clothing. He/she will stick out like a sore thumb.
- Some maps are survivor favored while others are killer favored. Unless you have an offering, you have to try your luck you will get a map that works in your favor (Ex. your play style and perks).
- New players might be lost when starting a game since playing the tutorial is not mandatory. While there are tips and tricks displayed, it may not be very informative to newer players trying to understand the concept of the game.
- There is a problem with leavers in-game, which can be a result of rage quitting or a mishap on the server's side. Either away, it can get annoying and ruin your gameplay experience.

All in all, a very enjoyable game especially with friends (That is if they aren't crying from fear) and deserves all the love it gets.

8.5/10

这游戏真的越来越没法玩了，就单纯一个模式根本就玩腻了，而且匹配机制也很蛋疼，匹配两小时，游戏五分钟

2 года игры и теперь я заканчиваю играть в эту некогда замечательную игру. Полный перевес за манов и практически полная невозможность нормально играть за сурвов. Да, я не крут в игре, но в свое время вполне прилично мог мансить, а теперь же удары манов далетают за 2 метра за окном и за 3 метра после прыжка через палетку. Играя за мана отметил решительный перевес в его сторону. Многие игроки просто ливают с катки и я их могу понять. Ливать нужно из игры совсем, а не просто с катки.

Gra jest zepsuta i  pełno w niej  niedociągnięć  , mam na myśli hitboxy oraz wadliwe serwery, gracze są  równie niemili i toksyczni  , nie zbalansowane postacie , może i zamysł fajny ale wykonanie już nie . NIE POLECAM

The first few games I played before being a bit more comfortable with the idea were truly some of the most terrifying moments I have ever had in a video game. I strongly encourage anyone seeking thrills and fun multiplayer to try this game as a survivor. Playing as a killer isn't so scary, but the idea of having ALL the power against helpless survivors is a lot of fun for casual playing.

The game is really fun. But it's kind of sad that it's crashing way too much. Sometimes you can play for hours and sometimes the game crashes every 20 minutes..

The game crashes too often, the connection is too often lost. I don't recommend the game in this current mess.

Update: After some more hours of playing I can confirm that crashes are seem to be gone.

Last Update here: The bugs are coming back on each patch. Most of the time new features have to be disabled again, because they are really buggy. Most of the time new things bring in new crash reasons. 

The development studio should take test driven development seriously, 'cause they really create crap all the time.
